src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: Altine, Sara Danius, sekreteer permanaa bu Comité Nobel bu literature ci Academi bu Suede, dafa xamle ci benn emisioŋu rajo ci Sveriges Radio ca Suède ni ginaaw kuréel gi mënul jokkoo ak Bob Dylan ci ki gàddu neexalu Nobel ci literature 2016, dakkal nañu li ñu ko doon jéema jokkoo ak moom.
hyp_text: Noo ca, Sara Danius, sekreteriyu bopp ba Nobel Jiitalu at Suedi Akadimii, def laa lañu defalas la radio bu Sveriges Radio bu Suedi, la komitee, ciyaar na laa Bob Dylan diyal, bopp bopp benn ci 2016 Nobel Jiitalu bopp bopp Jiitalu, laa lañu defalas laa lañu defalas.
